content: उत्प्लु {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To jump or leap up, bound, bound away; <ls>Śi. 12. 22</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">5. 5</ls>; leap out of; <ls>Rs. 1. 18.</ls> {@--2@} To spring or jump upon; यामुत्प्लुत्य वृको हन्यात् <ls>Ms. 8. 236.</ls> {@--3@} To float; <ls>K. 42.</ls> {@--4@} To be fluctuating; <ls>K. 296.</ls>
